content: this can be used with any washable fairly durable yarn and is good for leftovers the size can vary so long as each half of the ball is the same size it s an easy pattern to do and you can make a lot of them in relatively short order **note** humanitarian aid patterns are no longer officially available and submissions are no longer welcome to the humanitarian aid program see http //www ldsphilanthropies org/humanitarian-services/humanitarian-pattern html for more details however if you re interested in the pattern just to make it you can find the pattern in the wayback machine 1 all patterns are listed on the link above 1 http //web archive org/web/20110202030551/http //www ldsphilanthropies org/humanitarian-services/humanitarian-pattern html
